Class PostnetEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • PostnetEncoder

  • public class PostnetEncoder
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    baevans Encodes a barcode given a zipcode

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String barCode
      String that is made up of | and .
      private java.lang.String binaryRepresentation
      String that represents the binary value of the given barcode
      private java.lang.String zipCode
      String that represents the final zipcode after being decoded
